class_description:
Unchecked exception thrown when an illegal combination flags is given. Unless otherwise specified, passing a null argument to any
 method or constructor in this class will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

params.param_description: The set of format flags which contain an illegal combination

Methods.method_description: Constructs an instance of this class with the specified flags.
Returns the set of flags which contains an illegal combination.

return_description:
the detail message string of this Throwable instance
          (which may be null).

Methods.method_description: Returns the detail message string of this throwable.
